metadata.name: User Added To Admin Group Via DseditGroup
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to create and/or add an account to the admin group, thus granting admin privileges.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dseditgroup')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o edit ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -a ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t user')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('admin')))

output.summary: Detects attempts to create and/or add an account to the admin group, thus granting admin privileges.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/master/atomics/T1078.003/T1078.003.md#atomic-test-5---add-a-newexisting-user-to-the-admin-group-using-dseditgroup-utility---macos, https://ss64.com/osx/dseditgroup.html
